outputs.output_descr: The Project is designed to broaden access to justice, particularly for any vulnerable groups by means of wider introduction of the mediation institute in the Republic of Kazakhstan. All-round support to implement the Republic of Kazakhstan Law "On Mediation" will be provided based on foreign best practices study of pre-judicial settlement of disputes, development of a set of regulatory documents, including for certification and official evaluation of the mediators

project_descr: Introduction of Mediation institute in the Republic of Kazakhstan
